name: Super Cheat Fighter
description:
Controls:

Enter a target and command separated by a period. eg => Target.Command

Available targets and commands are given in a list.

A short game jam project based around breaking the rules.

Our interpretation was to have a fighting game where the only way to win is by cheating using dev commands.

Gameplay by TiltedTeapot and DandyKnightGames

Sprites by DandyKnightGames

Music by PTC_Andrew and Kyle
